marklogic.body: Â yeah right...they aint the ones with stretch-marked stomaches & 400 tattoos on their XXXXXXXLLL asses with 72 kids, 71 baby daddy's & doing welfare fraud so they can buy gucci purses & rims for the escalade while they live in a fucking condemned crack house...go to the food banks & get free Heat & hot water & section 8 houses but make sho you be havin dem bling-blingz on...sheeeeit nikkuh...crack-dealin, boot-lips, gungah fuckin baboons....LOL!!!!!!!!!
